meta_description: Supporting creative curiosity and expression through exhibitions and art education in Mount Dora, Florida since 1974.
admission_text:
## SUPPORT ART

##  Become a Member 

Support the Mount Dora Center for the Arts by becoming a member. Your membership will help support our wide range of art instruction and exhibitions. The center provides unparalleled resources for local artists and scholarships to underprivileged children in our community. 

[ Click Here ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251111111331/https://www.betterunite.com/MountDoraCenterfortheArts-mdcamembershipbeapartofit-1)

##  Purchase a Donor Paver 

Supporting art by purchasing an engraved brick paver is a meaningful way to contribute to the arts community while leaving a lasting legacy; your purchase not only funds artistic initiatives and public projects but also allows you to personalize the brick with a message, dedication, or artwork that can be appreciated by the community for years to come. 

[ Click Here ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251111111331/https://mountdoraart.com/donor-pavers/)

## Annual Membership Levels of Support

### Individual/Family

**Picasso : ****Student $25 Individual** **$50****Family $100**

  * One Year Membership Card

  * Access to VIP area for Art in the Alley and other special events

  * Discounts on classes & workshops

  * Email newsletters with exciting Center news

**Van Gogh: $150**

You will receive all the benefits of Picasso, PLUS two annual NARM Memberships entitling you to access benefits at over 600+ Museums and Galleries across North America. For a list of participating museums visit [NARM](http://w...
collections_text:
IMPORTANT NOTICE: It has come to our attention that calls coming into MDCA at 352-383-0880 have NOT been received since Aug 1. Voice mails have not been accessible either. We apologize if you have called with no response. MDCA’s NEW phone number is 352-385-7004. You can also contact us by email at i[nfo@mdca.org](mailto:info@mdca.org).

[ ](https://unitedartscfl.org/collaborativecampaign/)

## Uptown Gallery is Now Open!

## News: MDCA opens Location #2!

On SATURDAY AUG 2, 2025, Mount Dora Center for the Arts celebrated the grand opening of our 2nd location at the corner of 5th Ave and Highland St in Uptown Mount Dora, Fl. With excellent visibility, ample parking, and an accessible facility, the new Art Center’s second location will provide greater access to creative programs to foster artistic development, and enrich the cultural landscape for residents and visitors alike.

TAKE a [CLASS](https://mountdoraart.com/class-schedule/) – SEE the [GALLERY](https://mountdoraart.com/current-mdca-exhibit/)

**Visit MDCA’s Uptown location at 847 E.5th Ave, Mount Dora, FL**

**Gallery hours are Tues-Fri 10am-5pm / Sat & Sun 11am-5pm**

## Downtown Gallery is Still Open!

**MDCA Art classes and the MDAL Pop Up Exhibition and Art Sale are still available at our Downtown location at 138 E. 5th Ave Mount Dora, FL 32757**

**Gallery hours are Mon to Sun 11am – 5pm**

## Be a Featured Artist!- Call 352-305-8725 to find out how to feature your original artwork for sale in our downtown gallery...
